scripts.build:ui: cd part2-notes-backend && rm -rf dist && cd ../part2-notes-frontend && npm install && npm run build && cp -r dist ../part2-notes-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
scripts.build:x: cd part2-notes-frontend && npm install && npm run build && rm -rf ../part2-notes-backend/dist && cp -r dist ../part2-notes-backend
scripts.deploy:x: cd part2-notes-backend && npm install && npm start
